basics.name: Andre Matheus Rocha
basics.label: Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Andre Rocha is a full-stack software engineer. He graduated from the Software Engineering co-op program at the University of Ottawa. Andre is a disciplined, self-directed worker who learns very quickly and is accustomed to taking on challenges from conception all the way to implementation. His flexibility as a developer and dedication to the quality of his work is a valuable addition to any team.

work.summary: At 360pi I used Python, MongoDB, Ember and AWS to maintain, test and scale an enterprise-level B2B Saas web app, and helped take a new major product from conception to having its first clients.
highlights: Automated a significant part of the UI testing suite using Selenium, Saucelabs and Jenkins
Wrote tools to automate, simplify and speed up deployment to an AWS cloud infrastructure
Measurably improved and tested changes to an AI responsible for matching products from different sites together
Designed and implemented a scalable architecture for a platform upon which other products would be built
Used modern web technologies such as Gulp, ES2015, Sass and Browserify to set up a frontend asset pipeline and development workflow
Responsible for rapid prototyping of ideas with turnaround of a few hours, or minutes in some cases
Implemented an interactive, performant data visualization with thousands of data points using Javascript
Final project of university program, done as a contract with Searidge Technologies
Wrote a script that automatically tests the calibration of Searidgeâ€™s cameras
Designed the architecture and wrote an algorithm that compares calibration and test data to find any breaking changes
Designed and implemented a scalable and maintainable architecture for a website
Implemented friends, messaging, and notification features of the site
Used Stripe to implement a payment system that can accept payment on behalf of any OrbitHub user
Managed several web servers hosting hundreds of sites
Monitored apache logs, identifying any issues and determining a solution whenever possible
Wrote shell scripts to automate backups
Used Apache Cordova to debug an existing mobile application, and submitted it to both the Android Play Store and the iOS App Store
